results.title: A new in vivo method to retard progression of intervertebral disc degeneration through stimulation of endogenous stem cells with simvastatin.
results.text_hl: Herein we postulate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ can regulate the differentiation of @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocartilaginous_embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537927 @@@nucleus pulposus@@@ mensenchymal stem cells into @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocartilaginous_embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537927 @@@nucleus pulposus@@@ cell by promoting expression of hypoxia inducible factor to repair and reconstruct degenerated @DISEASE_Intervertebral_disc_disease @DISEASE_MESH:C535531 @@@IVD@@@.

citations.NLM: Huang Z, Zhang L, Feng X, Chen T, Bi S. A new in vivo method to retard progression of intervertebral disc degeneration through stimulation of endogenous stem cells with simvastatin. Med Hypotheses. 2017 Apr;101():65-66. PMID: 28351496

results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits IL-1beta-Induced Apoptosis and Extracellular Matrix Degradation by Suppressing the NF-kB and MAPK Pathways in Nucleus Pulposus Cells.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ Inhibits @GENE_IL1B @GENE_3553 @@@IL-1beta@@@-Induced Apoptosis and Extracellular Matrix Degradation by Suppressing the NF-kB and MAPK Pathways in @<m>DISEASE_Fibrocartilaginous_embolism</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537927 @@@Nucleus Pulposus@@@ Cells.
